about_the_game:
Set against the tumultuous backdrop of ancient China's Three Kingdoms era, Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai delivers fast-paced fighting action featuring an all-female cast of warlords. Engage in intense battles for kingdom supremacy, personal glory, and beyond.



Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai represents the pinnacle of extensive arcade game updates, meticulously rebalanced to align even more closely with the original vision: a fighter that's accessible to all.

Whether you're a genre veteran or a newcomer, this game has something for you. Veterans will appreciate the streamlined controls that let them dive right into the action, while newcomers can hone their skills through training and challenge modes, preparing them for both online and offline battles.



The Hougeki (Fatal Counter) system allows players the freedom to cook up their own combos, mixing ingredients like EX Special Attacks, Ougi and Hiougi: the cookbook is yours to command! With the freedom to add the spice of your choice to the mix with a selection of strategists (“assist” characters), this series update expands on the already winning recipe.
So get ready for the kind of epic battles you'd expect when warlords of ancient China clash!

Features:

  • Mix and match 14 different characters and 8 strategists to give your battle plan even more freedom!
  • Use the Hougeki system and careful management of the Tactics Bar to create devastating attacks and combos!
  • Special moves, EX special moves, super moves, and ultimate moves!
  • Play Arcade Mode and follow your favorite heroine’s story...
  • Battle friends locally and challenge the online rankings with matchmaking!
  • Practice in Training Mode then see if your new skills can best Challenge Mode!
  • Relive past glories or learn from your defeats with Replay Mode.
  • Comprehensive re-balance based on the latest arcade version of Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai.
  • Steam Achievements, Cloud, Trading Cards

name: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: Xbox 360 compatible controller recommended

reviews:
“...cheap price point, with lenient difficulty, solid teaching tools, and accessible mechanics...”
8.5 – PlayStation LifeStyle

“...a solid fighting game that feels satisfying to play, while being accompanied by a great soundtrack and pleasing graphics.”
7 – Cubed3

“The game really does offer something different compared to other fighting games and I think a lot of people will enjoy it once they've had a try. And with a super low price tag for entry, there really isn't a better time to hop on and have a go.”
8 – Destructoid
short_description: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai is a comprehensive rebalance of the popular fighter Koihime Enbu, featuring 14 playable characters, with “Chōryō” and "assist" character “Kaku” joining their rivals on the battlefield for the first time!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
